channel.title: [PI] Player Following
channel.description:
I follwed this [url=http://www.runekingdom.smffy.com/index.php?topic=393.0]tutorial[/url] for my player following clipping and everything worked fine for me except one thing.. If a player follows the another and after that try to move (the another player) it auto gets back behind the first one (the followed one) and just can't move, even if I press on 'map' try to move the player its automically go back to the followed player and stand there..
what should I do? If you want I can show you my classes..

item.title: [PI] Player Following
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

You’re not resetting the following in the walking packet, so whatever you do it’s going to keep following the player.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Player Following
item.dc:creator: @p0siner p0siner
item.description:
@p0siner wrote:

I follwed this tutorial for my player following clipping and everything worked fine for me except one thing… If a player follows the another and after that try to move (the another player) it auto gets back behind the first one (the followed one) and just can’t move, even if I press on ‘map’ try to move the player its automically go back to the followed player and stand there…

what should I do? If you want I can show you my classes…

Read full topic
